newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary forint ends little changed vs dlr.
newsitem.headline: Hungary forint ends little changed vs dlr.

text.p: Hungary's forint closed Thursday almost unchanged against the dollar from its midday level but slightly up on the day, dealers said.
The forint closed 10 pips below the central bank's resistance level at 170.94/99 to one dollar, compared to 170.93.98 at noon and 171.00/10 at the opening.

The Hungarian unit continued to follow a rangebound dollar/mark with no domestic factors affecting trade, a picture not expected to change with the approaching tax payment deadline on the 10th, traders added.
